data.title: Create Slack App
data.description: Create and configure the app from https://api.slack.com/apps.

data.title: Complete Server Code
data.description: Handle the socket endpoints and store the tasks in tasks.json.

data.title: Push To Github
data.description: Create a new public repository and push the code to github.

data.title: Submit the project
data.description: Mail the code repository link with a video if possible.
